q: Klunk and Catherine Bodock, media director of Keenan-Nagle Advertising in Allentown, agree that Michael Vick still has a few more dues to pay before deals are struck with big-money companies on the national stage. I'm glad the Eagles hired him, Bodock said. "He deserved a second chance, he did his time. That said, from a marketing perspective, I'm not sure that his image has been repaired enough.
